caseTitle: Sui Northern Gas Pipelines Limited, through its General Manage, Rawalpindi v. Muhammad Arshad
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 13 of the Gas (Theft Control and Recovery) Act, 2016 read with Order XXXXIII, Rule 3 of C.P.C. (2) SOP for dealing the theft cases of gas approved by OGRA (3) Article 117 of the Qanun-e-Shahadat Order, 1984. (4) Lawsuits are decided on preponderance of evidence and the Court has to see which party has discharged the onus of proof.
